trans-unit.source: Represents the attributes and metadata for an XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 表示的属性和元数据 XML Web 服务方法。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMethod"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新<xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMethod"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMethod"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新<xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMethod"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> to which this method belongs.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>此方法所属。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo"></xref> with which to initialize this <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMethod"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo"> </xref>用来初始化此<xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapServerMethod"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_SOAPAction" name="SOAPAction" href=""></xref> HTTP header field of SOAP requests that are sent to this XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref uid="langword_csharp_SOAPAction" name="SOAPAction" href=""></xref>的发送到此 XML Web service 方法的 SOAP 请求的 HTTP 标头字段。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the <xref uid="langword_csharp_SOAPAction" name="SOAPAction" href=""></xref> HTTP header field of SOAP requests that are sent to this XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>包含<xref uid="langword_csharp_SOAPAction" name="SOAPAction" href=""></xref>的发送到此 XML Web service 方法的 SOAP 请求的 HTTP 标头字段。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBindingUse"></xref> value that specifies whether the parts of SOAP messages sent to this XML Web service method are encoded as abstract type definitions or concrete schema definitions.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBindingUse"></xref>值，该值指定是否发送到此 XML Web 服务方法的 SOAP 消息的部分被编码为抽象类型的定义或具体架构定义。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBindingUse"></xref> value that specifies whether the parts of SOAP messages sent to this XML Web service method are encoded as abstract type definitions or concrete schema definitions.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBindingUse"> </xref>值，该值指定是否发送到此 XML Web 服务方法的 SOAP 消息的部分被编码为抽象类型的定义或具体架构定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping"></xref> used with SOAP requests to this Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping"> </xref> SOAP 请求到此 Web 服务方法使用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping"></xref> used with SOAP requests to this Web service method.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping"> </xref> SOAP 请求到此 Web 服务方法使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> used with SOAP requests to this Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>SOAP 请求到此 Web 服务方法使用。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> used with SOAP requests to this Web service method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>SOAP 请求到此 Web 服务方法使用。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo"></xref> associated with this XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo"></xref>与此 XML Web 服务方法关联。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo"></xref> associated with this XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo"> </xref>与此 XML Web 服务方法关联。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref:System.Boolean> that indicates whether an XML Web service client waits for the Web server to finish processing this XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref:System.Boolean>，该值指示 XML Web 服务客户端是否等待要完成处理此 XML Web service 方法的 Web 服务器。</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the XML Web service client does not wait for the Web server to completely process this XML Web service method; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果 XML Web 服务客户端不会等待 Web 服务器来完全处理此 XML Web 服务方法。否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping"></xref> used with SOAP responses from this Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping"></xref>用于此 Web 服务方法的 SOAP 响应。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping"></xref> used with SOAP responses from this Web service method.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMembersMapping"> </xref>用于此 Web 服务方法的 SOAP 响应。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> used with SOAP responses from this Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>用于此 Web 服务方法的 SOAP 响应。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> used with SOAP responses from this Web service method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>用于此 Web 服务方法的 SOAP 响应。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> used with parameters that are passed to this Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>与传递到此 Web 服务方法的参数一起使用。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> used with parameters that are passed to this Web service method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>与传递到此 Web 服务方法的参数一起使用。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapParameterStyle"></xref> object that specifies how parameters are formatted in SOAP messages sent to this XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapParameterStyle"></xref>对象，它指定如何格式化参数发送到此 XML Web 服务方法的 SOAP 消息中。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapParameterStyle"></xref> that specifies how parameters are formatted in SOAP messages sent to this XML Web service method.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapParameterStyle"> </xref> ，它指定如何格式化参数发送到此 XML Web 服务方法的 SOAP 消息中。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> used with return values from this Web service method.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>与来自此 Web 服务方法的返回值一起使用。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> used with return values from this Web service method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>与来自此 Web 服务方法的返回值一起使用。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref:System.Boolean> that indicates whether SOAP messages sent to and from this XML Web service method use RPC formatting.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref:System.Boolean>，该值指示传入与传出此 XML Web service 方法的 SOAP 消息是否使用 RPC 格式设置。</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if SOAP messages sent to and from this XML Web service method use RPC formatting; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果 SOAP 消息发送到和来自此 XML Web 服务方法使用 RPC 格式设置;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.Services.WsiProfiles"></xref> value that indicates the Web Services Interoperability (WSI) specification to which this Web service claims to conform.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Web.Services.WsiProfiles"></xref>值，该值指示此 Web 服务声明以符合 Web 服务互操作性 (WSI) 规范。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.WsiProfiles"></xref> value that indicates the Web Services Interoperability (WSI) specification to which this Web service claims to conform.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.Services.WsiProfiles"> </xref>值，该值指示此 Web 服务声明以符合 Web 服务互操作性 (WSI) 规范。
